name: sgu-microservices
description: Sistema de GestiÃ³n Universitaria - Microservicios con Patrones de DiseÃ±o

scripts.test:all: npm run test:services && npm run test:patterns
scripts.test:services: npm run test:auth && npm run test:courses && npm run test:enrollment && npm run test:notifications && npm run test:payments && npm run test:gateway
scripts.test:services:parallel: concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,green,yellow,blue,red" --names "auth,courses,enrollment,notifications,payments,gateway" "npm run test:auth" "npm run test:courses" "npm run test:enrollment" "npm run test:notifications" "npm run test:payments" "npm run test:gateway"
scripts.test:services:fast:parallel: concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,green,yellow,blue,red" --names "auth,courses,enrollment,notifications,payments,gateway" "cd auth-service && npm run test:fast" "cd courses-service && npm run test:fast" "cd enrollment-service && npm run test:fast" "cd notifications-service && npm run test:fast" "cd payments-service && npm run test:fast" "cd api-gateway && npm run test:fast"
scripts.test:patterns: npm run test:ddd && npm run test:factory && npm run test:strategy && npm run test:decorator
scripts.test:factory: npm run test:factory:notifications && npm run test:factory:payments && npm run test:factory:validators
scripts.test:strategy: cd enrollment-service && npm test -- tests/strategies/ && npm test -- tests/services/
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:setup && npm run test:integration:run && npm run test:integration:cleanup
scripts.test:integration:services: npm run test:integration:auth && npm run test:integration:enrollment
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:services && npm run test:coverage:patterns
scripts.test:coverage:services: npm run test:coverage:auth && npm run test:coverage:courses && npm run test:coverage:enrollment && npm run test:coverage:notifications && npm run test:coverage:payments && npm run test:coverage:gateway
scripts.test:coverage:patterns: npm run test:coverage:ddd && npm run test:coverage:factory && npm run test:coverage:strategy && npm run test:coverage:decorator
scripts.test:coverage:ddd: cd enrollment-service && npm run test:coverage -- tests/domain/
scripts.test:coverage:factory: npm run test:coverage:factory:notifications && npm run test:coverage:factory:payments && npm run test:coverage:factory:validators
scripts.test:coverage:factory:notifications: cd notifications-service && npm run test:coverage -- tests/factories/
scripts.test:coverage:factory:payments: cd payments-service && npm run test:coverage -- tests/factories/
scripts.test:coverage:factory:validators: cd enrollment-service && npm run test:coverage -- tests/factories/
scripts.test:coverage:strategy: cd enrollment-service && npm run test:coverage -- tests/strategies/ && npm run test:coverage -- tests/services/
scripts.test:coverage:decorator: cd api-gateway && npm run test:coverage -- tests/decorators/
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:auth && npm run lint:courses && npm run lint:enrollment && npm run lint:notifications && npm run lint:payments && npm run lint:gateway
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:auth && npm run lint:fix:courses && npm run lint:fix:enrollment && npm run lint:fix:notifications && npm run lint:fix:payments && npm run lint:fix:gateway
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:auth && npm run format:check:courses && npm run format:check:enrollment && npm run format:check:notifications && npm run format:check:payments && npm run format:check:gateway
scripts.format:write: npm run format:write:auth && npm run format:write:courses && npm run format:write:enrollment && npm run format:write:notifications && npm run format:write:payments && npm run format:write:gateway
scripts.install:all: npm run install:auth && npm run install:courses && npm run install:enrollment && npm run install:notifications && npm run install:payments && npm run install:gateway
scripts.build:all: npm run build:auth && npm run build:courses && npm run build:enrollment && npm run build:notifications && npm run build:payments && npm run build:gateway
scripts.start:all: npm run start:auth && npm run start:courses && npm run start:enrollment && npm run start:notifications && npm run start:payments && npm run start:gateway
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:auth && npm run dev:courses && npm run dev:enrollment && npm run dev:notifications && npm run dev:payments && npm run dev:gateway
scripts.patterns:report: npm run patterns:coverage && npm run patterns:summary
scripts.patterns:summary: echo 'ðŸ“Š Design Patterns Implementation Summary' && echo '============================================' && echo 'âœ… Domain-Driven Design (DDD): Implemented' && echo 'âœ… Factory Method: Implemented' && echo 'âœ… Strategy: Implemented' && echo 'âœ… Decorator: Implemented' && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ All patterns working together successfully!'

author: SGU Development Team
